Text:
Hi, i don't suppose you have the Howard TV of Whitney Cummings on Howard Stern 18th August 2010

Also i'm wanting the 12-09-08 ep which has the hottest funny chick competition in video also, got the 24kbps audio that you did but would love the video or at the very least a 128kbps rip.

you're doing a great job wushdishmeen!

For the secondary content like HTV, H101, and Bubba Raw you have to join the WDM Network.  Everything you are looking for is there for direct DL and streaming.

I unfortunately don't have the time or resources to seed all of my archives as I have 2 other people helping me build it.

Just sign up at our site it's free and most definitely the best source for Stern.  The URL is in the torrent description.  Wait for approval and your registration will be accepted within the hour if it's not busy.
